body_text: Can we hook up some icons for Live, Approved, Rejected states? I could see a use case where the timeline is used to quickly jump to the last approved revision/etc.
body: Can we hook up some icons for `Live`, `Approved`, `Rejected` states? I could see a use case where the timeline is used to quickly jump to the last approved revision/etc.
